title: 02/16/2021 - HOUR 1 - No Thanks Cleveland, Likeability Protects, Ryen Russillo
itunes:title: 02/16/2021 - HOUR 1 - No Thanks Cleveland, Likeability Protects, Ryen Russillo
description:
In this hour of The Herd with Colin Cowherd, there's a recent report about outgoing Houston defensive end J.J. Watt possibly signing with Cleveland--Colin doesn't buy it and he explains why. Also, Chicago is a better destination for quarterback signings like Sam Darnold and Carson Wentz than you think. Plus, likeability in professional sports protects some coaches more than others; Colin shares an example of such in the NFL. Finally, The Ringer's Ryen Russillo joins Colin to discuss player movements in the NFL. 

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
